com.psddev.dari.db

Class Database.Static

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.psddev.dari.db.Database.Static
  • Enclosing interface:
    Database

    public static final class Database.Static
extends Object
    Database utility methods.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static <T> T findById(Database database, Class<T> type, UUID id)
      Finds an object of the given type matching the given id using the given database.
      static <T> T findUnique(Database database, Class<T> type, String field, String value)
      Finds an unique object of the given type matching the given field and value using the given database.
      static List<Database> getAll()
      Returns a list of all databases.
      static <T extends Database>

      Returns a list of all databases of the given databaseClass.
      static Database getCreator(Object object)
      Returns the database that caused the given object to be created.

      Returns the default database.
      static Database getDefaultOriginal()
      Returns the original default database without using the overrides.

      Returns the default database override in the current thread.

      Returns the first database of the given databaseClass.

      Returns the database with the given name.
      static Set<String> getNames()
      Deprecated. 
      Use getAll() and Database.getName() instead.
      static boolean isIgnoreReadConnection()
      Returns true if the databases should ignore read-specific connections.
      static Database overrideDefault(Database override)
      Overrides the default database with the given override in the current thread.
      static <T> Iterable<T> readIterable(Database database, Query<T> query, int fetchSize)
      Deprecated. 
      Use Database.readIterable(com.psddev.dari.db.Query<T>, int) instead.
      static Database restoreDefault()
      Restores the default database to the previous value before overrideDefault(com.psddev.dari.db.Database) was called.
      static void setDefaultOverride(Database override)
      Deprecated. 
      Use overrideDefault(com.psddev.dari.db.Database) and/or restoreDefault() instead.
      static void setIgnoreReadConnection(boolean isIgnoreReadConnection)
      Sets whether the databases should ignore read-specific connections.

        protected static final PullThroughCache<String,Database> INSTANCES

    • Method Detail

      • getAll

        public static List<Database> getAll()
        Returns a list of all databases.
        Returns:
        Never null. Mutable.

      • getInstance

        public static Database getInstance(String name)
        Returns the database with the given name.
        Parameters:
        name - If blank, returns the default database.
        Returns:
        Never null.

      • getDefault

        public static Database getDefault()
        Returns the default database.
        Returns:
        Never null.

      • getDefaultOriginal

        public static Database getDefaultOriginal()
        Returns the original default database without using the overrides.
        Returns:
        Never null.
        Throws:
        SettingsException - If a default database isn't defined.

      • getDefaultOverride

        public static Database getDefaultOverride()
        Returns the default database override in the current thread.
        Returns:
        May be null.

      • overrideDefault

        public static Database overrideDefault(Database override)
        Overrides the default database with the given override in the current thread.
        Parameters:
        override - Can't be null.
        Returns:
        Current default database before overriding.

      • restoreDefault

        public static Database restoreDefault()
        Restores the default database to the previous value before overrideDefault(com.psddev.dari.db.Database) was called.
        Returns:
        Current default database before the restoration.
        Throws:
        NoSuchElementException - If overrideDefault(com.psddev.dari.db.Database) wasn't called before.

      • isIgnoreReadConnection

        public static boolean isIgnoreReadConnection()
        Returns true if the databases should ignore read-specific connections.

      • setIgnoreReadConnection

        public static void setIgnoreReadConnection(boolean isIgnoreReadConnection)
        Sets whether the databases should ignore read-specific connections.

      • getByClass

        public static <T extends Database> List<T> getByClass(Class<T> databaseClass)
        Returns a list of all databases of the given databaseClass.
        Parameters:
        databaseClass - Can't be null.
        Returns:
        Never null. Mutable.

      • getFirst

        public static <T extends Database> T getFirst(Class<T> databaseClass)
        Returns the first database of the given databaseClass.

        The default database is always checked first.

        Parameters:
        databaseClass - Can't be null.
        Returns:
        May be null.

      • findById

        public static <T> T findById(Database database,
             Class<T> type,
             UUID id)
        Finds an object of the given type matching the given id using the given database.

      • findUnique

        public static <T> T findUnique(Database database,
               Class<T> type,
               String field,
               String value)
        Finds an unique object of the given type matching the given field and value using the given database.

      • getCreator

        public static Database getCreator(Object object)
        Returns the database that caused the given object to be created.
        Returns:
        May be null if the information isn't available.

      • getNames

        @Deprecated
public static Set<String> getNames()
        Deprecated. Use getAll() and Database.getName() instead.

      • setDefaultOverride

        @Deprecated
public static void setDefaultOverride(Database override)
        Deprecated. Use overrideDefault(com.psddev.dari.db.Database) and/or restoreDefault() instead.

      • readIterable

        @Deprecated
public static <T> Iterable<T> readIterable(Database database,
                                      Query<T> query,
                                      int fetchSize)
        Deprecated. Use Database.readIterable(com.psddev.dari.db.Query<T>, int) instead.
